text: Hianagi Israeli vahetmimo'zama Nagri'ma natre'za kaza osu havi anumzantamima ome avaririzage'zama Livae pristi vahetamima Zadokimpinti'ma fore'ma hu'naza vahe'mo'zama Nagrite'ma mani fatgo hu'neza navariri'naza vahemozage Nagri navuga otine'za afu afovane koranena ofa hugahaze huno hanavenetake Anumzamo'a hu'ne.
